eager to learn about the sales process and industry trends.ability to work effectively in a team and collaborate with cross-functional departments.

job description summaryresponsible to ensure inbound documentation and transaction in sap meeting the daily kpi.job descriptionessential responsibilities:

to ensure inbound documentation and transaction in sap meeting the daily kpi.
assist in clearing good inward report.
receiving and checking deliveries to ensure that correct amount, part number, part description and quantity is delivered.
assist to check all customs documentation and paperwork attached to received item.
consignment without paperwork to be highlighted to receiving inspector for fast follow up or email to respective owner to take action.
to check receiving of parts and ensure with awb number and customs documentation for easy reference.
any discrepancy on packaging of parts shall be highlighted to receiving inspector / shift leader for fast actions.
perform sap transaction concurrently with the receiving process of the parts.
connect to vendor performance specialist and procurement specialist
engine part/ component with issues shall be quarantined as commercial quarantine at designated quarantine area.
escalate to shift leader for any parts in commercial quarantine has exceeded 48 hours
scanning of incoming document in the scanner and indexing of documentation for easy reference.
to assist on creation of inbound engine, outbound engine, module whenever required.

learning objectives: throughout the duration of the internship, the intern will learn how to: 

identify and define the common business terminology used at the worksite.
solve problems and create value for the organization and stakeholders. 
understand the receiving process and downstream processes in aerospace/ aviation industry.
meet quality requirement / aviation airworthiness requirements.
pay attention to detail and important information.
demonstrate multi-channel communication skills including oral, written, audio/visual and digital.

qualifications / requirements:

diploma in logistics/ transportation or supply chain management or related field. 
moderate in spoken and written english. 
strong teamwork skills.

desired characteristics:

passionate working in a maintenance repair and overhaul shop
strong desire to work in a teaming environment
humble: respectful, receptive, agile, eager to learn
transparent: shares critical information, speaks with candor, contributes constructively
focused: quick learner, strategically prioritizes work, committedÂ Â 
leadership ability: strong communicator, decision-maker, collaborative
problem solver: analytical-minded, challenges existing processes, critical thinker

additional informationrelocation assistance provided: no

descriptionjob summary for it intern:as an it intern, you will assist the it team in supporting and maintaining the company's computer systems, gaining exposure to various it operations, and contributing to website development and basic ai automation tasks. this internship is ideal for individuals seeking hands-on experience in it and aiming to expand their knowledge of computer engineering and technology.
key responsibilities:- assist in installing, configuring, and maintaining software applications and technical systems.- provide technical support to end users by troubleshooting hardware and software issues.- monitor system performance, conduct routine maintenance, and ensure it systems' security and reliability.- collaborate with senior it staff to understand business requirements and propose technical solutions.- support website development activities, including content updates, website maintenance, and basic design tasks.- learn and contribute to basic ai automation tasks, such as data entry automation and chatbot development.- assist in documenting it processes, procedures, and user manuals.- participate in it projects and initiatives under the guidance of senior it personnel.- stay updated with industry trends and technologies in computer engineering and it.
requirements:- currently pursuing a diploma or bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field.- basic understanding of computer hardware, operating systems, and software applications.- familiarity with web development technologies (html/css, javascript) is advantageous.- eagerness to learn and develop technical skills in it operations and support.- strong problem-solving abilities with attention to detail.- good communication and interpersonal skills.- ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and willingness to contribute to group projects.- adaptability and enthusiasm for taking on new challenges and learning opportunities in the it field.

company overview
at motorola solutions, we're guided by a shared purpose - helping people be their best in the moments that matter - and we live up to our purpose every day by solving for safer. because people can only be their best when they not only feel safe, but are safe. we're solving for safer by building the best possible technologies across every part of our safety and security ecosystem. that's mission -critical communications devices and networks, ai-powered video security & access control and the ability to unite voice, video and data in a single command center view. we're solving for safer by connecting public safety agencies and enterprises, enabling the collaboration that's critical to connect those in need with those who can help. the work we do here matters.

department overview
product orderability provides an end-to-end integrated system and process that helps to organize and streamline critical aspects of doing business, accounting and enabling revenue.
job description
we are seeking highly motivated interns to join our organization, product orderability. as an intern, you will have the opportunity to gain hands-on experience in oracle cpq, ebs and test tools as well learn the quote to cash process. you will work closely with our team of experts to support product and service enablement, ensuring accurate configuration and pricing for our products and subscription services. this internship is ideal for undergraduate students studying it, computer science, or software engineering, who are eager to apply their knowledge in a practical setting.
responsibilities:

assist in the implementation and maintenance of the oracle cpq system to support product configuration and pricing.
collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze product requirements and ensure orderability and configurability.
conduct testing and quality assurance activities to validate the accuracy and functionality of the cpq system.
assist in troubleshooting and resolving issues related to orderability and configuration management.
participate in product enablement activities, including training and documentation development.
contribute to continuous improvement initiatives to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of orderability and configuration management processes.

â€‹
this internship offers a valuable opportunity to gain practical experience in product orderability, configuration management, and oracle cpq. if you are a motivated and enthusiastic undergraduate student looking to apply your skills in a dynamic and challenging environment, we encourage you to apply.
#li-mh

basic requirements
basic requirements:

currently enrolled in an undergraduate program (bachelor's degree), studying it, computer science, or software engineering.
strong understanding of software development principles and methodologies.
familiarity with oracle cpq or similar configuration management systems is a plus.
proficiency in programming languages such as java, c++, or python.
excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
attention to detail and ability to work with complex data structures.
effective communication skills, both written and verbal.
ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.
proactive and eager to learn and contribute to the team.

for those who interested with the internship opportunity, please send in your application with updated resume mentioning your internship period and date.
#li-mh

company overview
at motorola solutions, we're guided by a shared purpose - helping people be their best in the moments that matter - and we live up to our purpose every day by solving for safer. because people can only be their best when they not only feel safe, but are safe. we're solving for safer by building the best possible technologies across every part of our safety and security ecosystem. that's mission -critical communications devices and networks, ai-powered video security & access control and the ability to unite voice, video and data in a single command center view. we're solving for safer by connecting public safety agencies and enterprises, enabling the collaboration that's critical to connect those in need with those who can help. the work we do here matters.

department overview
product orderability provides an end-to-end integrated system and process that helps to organize and streamline critical aspects of doing business, accounting and enabling revenue.
job description
we are seeking highly motivated interns to join our organization, product orderability. as an intern, you will have the opportunity to gain hands-on experience in oracle cpq, ebs and test tools as well learn the quote to cash process. you will work closely with our team of experts to support product and service enablement, ensuring accurate configuration and pricing for our products and subscription services. this internship is ideal for undergraduate students studying it, computer science, or software engineering, who are eager to apply their knowledge in a practical setting.
responsibilities:

assist in the implementation and maintenance of the oracle cpq system to support product configuration and pricing.
collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze product requirements and ensure orderability and configurability.
conduct testing and quality assurance activities to validate the accuracy and functionality of the cpq system.
assist in troubleshooting and resolving issues related to orderability and configuration management.
participate in product enablement activities, including training and documentation development.
contribute to continuous improvement initiatives to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of orderability and configuration management processes.

â€‹
this internship offers a valuable opportunity to gain practical experience in product orderability, configuration management, and oracle cpq. if you are a motivated and enthusiastic undergraduate student looking to apply your skills in a dynamic and challenging environment, we encourage you to apply.
#li-mh

basic requirements
basic requirements:

currently enrolled in an undergraduate program (bachelor's degree), studying it, computer science, or software engineering.
strong understanding of software development principles and methodologies.
familiarity with oracle cpq or similar configuration management systems is a plus.
proficiency in programming languages such as java, c++, or python.
excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
attention to detail and ability to work with complex data structures.
effective communication skills, both written and verbal.
ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.
proactive and eager to learn and contribute to the team.

for those who interested with the internship opportunity, please send in your application with updated resume mentioning your internship period and date.
#li-mh

travel requirementsnone
relocation providednone
position typeintern
referral payment planno
eeo statement
motorola solutions is an equal opportunity employer. all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion or belief, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status or any other legally-protected characteristic.Â

job description
essential responsibilities:

to ensure inbound documentation and transaction in sap meeting the daily kpi.
assist in clearing good inward report.
receiving and checking deliveries to ensure that correct amount, part number, part description and quantity is delivered.
assist to check all customs documentation and paperwork attached to received item.
consignment without paperwork to be highlighted to receiving inspector for fast follow up or email to respective owner to take action.
to check receiving of parts and ensure with awb number and customs documentation for easy reference.
any discrepancy on packaging of parts shall be highlighted to receiving inspector / shift leader for fast actions.
perform sap transaction concurrently with the receiving process of the parts.
connect to vendor performance specialist and procurement specialist
engine part/ component with issues shall be quarantined as commercial quarantine at designated quarantine area.
escalate to shift leader for any parts in commercial quarantine has exceeded 48 hours
scanning of incoming document in the scanner and indexing of documentation for easy reference.
to assist on creation of inbound engine, outbound engine, module whenever required.

learning objectives: throughout the duration of the internship, the intern will learn how to: 

identify and define the common business terminology used at the worksite.
solve problems and create value for the organization and stakeholders. 
understand the receiving process and downstream processes in aerospace/ aviation industry.
meet quality requirement / aviation airworthiness requirements.
pay attention to detail and important information.
demonstrate multi-channel communication skills including oral, written, audio/visual and digital.

qualifications / requirements:
diploma in logistics/ transportation or supply chain management or related field. 
desired characteristics:

passionate working in a maintenance repair and overhaul shop
strong desire to work in a teaming environment
humble: respectful, receptive, agile, eager to learn
transparent: shares critical information, speaks with candor, contributes constructively
focused: quick learner, strategically prioritizes work, committedÂ Â 
leadership ability: strong communicator, decision-maker, collaborative
problem solver: analytical-minded, challenges existing processes, critical thinker

additional information

relocation assistance provided: no

job summary:
we are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented intern to join our microbiology lab department. as an intern, you will work closely with our experienced microbiologists to assist in various laboratory tasks and research projects. this internship provides a great opportunity for those who are interested in gaining hands-on experience in the field of microbiology.
skills:
- basic understanding of microbiology principles and techniques
- ability to follow laboratory protocols and procedures
- strong attention to detail and accuracy
- good communication skills 
- ability to work independently or as part of a team
responsibilities:
- assist in conducting various laboratory experiments such as bacterial culture, microbial identification, etc.
- prepare samples for analysis using appropriate techniques 
- maintain laboratory equipment and supplies 
- record data accurately and maintain organized records 
- participate in lab meetings and present findings 
qualifications:
- pursuing a degree or recently graduated from a relevant field such as microbiology, or related fields 
- knowledge of basic microbiology principles 
- familiarity with microsoft office applications (word, excel)

descriptionjob responsibilitiesâ€¢ contribute to curriculum development, innovation, enhancement, and quality assurance in the undergraduate and postgraduate curriculum.â€¢ develop and deliver innovative and excellent teaching, learning and assessment experiences for undergraduate and postgraduate students.â€¢ conduct world class research, maintaining an active record of high quality, publication, grants.â€¢ contribute to the development and implementation of a research strategy for consistent with the research priorities.â€¢ contribute to the development of strong collaborations with other universities and with government, industry and/or civil society to drive research impact and educational excellence.â€¢ contribute to the management of education, research and/or administration in the school, including coaching, mentorship, leadership and effective performance management
job requirementsâ€¢ phd in computer science and expertise is the area of cloud computing â€¢ strong interest and expertise in teaching, research and be involved in scholarly activities.
companyquest international university (qiu) is a private and comprehensive research-led university established in the malaysian state of perak under the higher educational institutions act 555 on june 12, 2008. it is owned by global integrated training associates sdn bhd (formerly known as blair education services sdn bhd), and the state government of perak has equity participation along with the qi group. 
as a private comprehensive university, students are our top priority. to engage the students and instil in them the hunger for knowledge, we believe in blending theory and practice in education. we believe that planting the seeds of curiosity in students from the outset will inspire them to make knowledge-seeking their quest in life.
we ensure that our programmes are industry-relevant using motivational teaching methods which are highly effective. qiu graduates will emerge from the university equipped with the skills that will make them ready for the job market and to continue their knowledge seeking quest.
at qiu, we focus not just on academics but also on giving students an ingrained love for the environment and the community. all qiu graduates will grow to become well-rounded citizens with an excellent education and a caring heart â€“ not just for their fellow man, but for the environment and earth as well.

at teleport, weâ€™re on a mission to innovate in a traditional cargo and delivery industry. to enable everyone, from single merchants to the largest companies, to move goods and e-commerce anywhere in southeast asia and beyond. to simply work, like magic. therefore itâ€™s critical to ensure our content is relevant to our potential customers ranging from major
e-commerce players to individuals who want parcels delivered.
we are looking for someone enthusiastic and resilient. as an intern in the cargo strategy & projects team, you will be based out of our office in redq, sepang. you will be expected to be performing this role on a full-time basis. you will be expected to be performing this role on a full-time basis. the role reports to the assistant manager, strategy & projects. you will fit perfectly if you enjoy a fast-paced working environment with passionate colleagues. 
a day in a life
as a start-up, you can expect your days to be pretty varied. multitasking is normal, and sometimes, your skills or natural talents will be leveraged to support other business priorities. that said, the bulk of your working hours should involve you having to:
â— document and map out teleport overall revenue recognition and user journey process, collaborating with multiple stakeholders across revenue management, commercial and finance
â— identify key points of current process failures and devise and recommend potential remedies to mitigate potential revenue leakages
â— maintain an up-to-date repository of all revenue-related documents including but not limited to airwaybill scanned copies and cargo manifests
â— ensure that individual gross, chargeable weights and freight rates on individual airway bills are captured accurately in accordance with including but not limited to weight breaks, agent/shipper, commodity code and rate validity
â— ensure that monthly cargo sales reports produced by our general sales agents are consistent with actual revenue records
â— communicate and resolve any revenue discrepancies and variance with revenue management and finance
requirements
skills
these are minimum-requirement skills and a â€˜must-haveâ€™ for the role:
â— excellent problem solving skills, with a focus on delivering implementable solutions and results
â— willingness to work outside their comfort zone and try new things
â— proficient in powerpoint, word, and excel
â— highly developed oral & written communication skills - especially in english
qualifications & experience
â— final year students pursuing degree in finance/ accounting/ statistics/ economics
â— willing to commit for a minimum of 3-6 months
â— have working experience (would gain extra pointer)

JobTitle: Intern, CAMO Technical Records and Purchasing
summary:
job description airasia x is a leading long-haul, low-cost airline based in malaysia. as part of the airasia group, airasia x operates a fleet of wide-body aircraft to various destinations worldwide, providing affordable travel options to millions of passengers. airasia x is seeking a highly motivated and proactive intern to join our camo (continuing airworthiness management organization) technical records and purchasing team.
this internship offers an excellent opportunity for individuals interested in gaining hands-on experience in aircraft maintenance and procurement processes within the aviation industry. key responsibilities: planning: to have an exposure on a day-to-day process of planning maintenance task cards handling from forecasting, issuing, monitoring, vetting and reporting back. to familiarize on the types of task cards used and the functions in planning dept.
to learn more on the aircraft light and heavy maintenance procedure. materials: to have an exposure on day to day purchasing activity ( acknowledge request, send rfq, price evaluation and po issuance.) to learn more on the supply chain process + invoice processing familiarise amos system to check on the spares availability tech services: exposure to continuing airworthiness management activities - airworthiness directive management, reliability, maintenance program, repair and modification processes technical support function of p145, exposure to mass & balance training on aircraft induction - items to identify in terms of aircraft config, regulatory requirement, timeline. job responsibilities :this role requires to collaborate with requesters and engineers on product requirements and business processes, translating product requirements into workable models, and writing functional specifications with diagrams, wireframes, and solutions. the role was also required to assist document knowledge base and liaise with technical teams to understand application flow and limitations, technical tasks, projects, and tools like confluence & jira.this role requires to collaborate with requesters and engineers on product requirements and business processes, translating product requirements into workable models, and writing functional specifications with diagrams, wireframes, and solutions. the role was also required to assist document knowledge base and liaise with technical teams to understand application flow and limitations, technical tasks, projects, and tools like confluence & jira.

assists in translating the requirements of the product into logical workable models.
assist in writing detailed functional requirement specification which includes workflow diagram, wireframe/mock-ups, process design, and evaluating alternative solutions as needed.
enhance the knowledge base documentation for system and application specification.
assists in the documentation of sop/policy
work closely with the support team on the post-implementation of features & crs
prepare meeting/discussion materials, and conduct meetings when necessary.
improve agile workflow and atlassian jira automation if possible.
follow up on technical projects in and timely to ensure satisfaction of deliverables.

pre-requisites :
undergo studying in a bachelorâ€™s degree in computer science, information technology, or equivalent.
excellent communication and interpersonal skills, both written and verbal
highly motivated self-starter, detail, and quality oriented
ability to establish rapport with stakeholders.

descriptionjob responsibilitiesâ€¢ contribute to curriculum development, innovation, enhancement, and quality assurance in the undergraduate and postgraduate curriculum.â€¢ develop and deliver innovative and excellent teaching, learning and assessment experiences for undergraduate and postgraduate students.â€¢ conduct world class research, maintaining an active record of high quality, publication, grants.â€¢ contribute to the development and implementation of a research strategy for consistent with the research priorities.â€¢ contribute to the development of strong collaborations with other universities and with government, industry and/or civil society to drive research impact and educational excellence.â€¢ contribute to the management of education, research and/or administration in the school, including coaching, mentorship, leadership and effective performance management
job requirementsâ€¢ phd in computer science and expertise is the area of cloud computing â€¢ strong interest and expertise in teaching, research and be involved in scholarly activities.
companyquest international university (qiu) is a private and comprehensive research-led university established in the malaysian state of perak under the higher educational institutions act 555 on june 12, 2008. it is owned by global integrated training associates sdn bhd (formerly known as blair education services sdn bhd), and the state government of perak has equity participation along with the qi group. 
as a private comprehensive university, students are our top priority. to engage the students and instil in them the hunger for knowledge, we believe in blending theory and practice in education. we believe that planting the seeds of curiosity in students from the outset will inspire them to make knowledge-seeking their quest in life.
we ensure that our programmes are industry-relevant using motivational teaching methods which are highly effective. qiu graduates will emerge from the university equipped with the skills that will make them ready for the job market and to continue their knowledge seeking quest.
at qiu, we focus not just on academics but also on giving students an ingrained love for the environment and the community. all qiu graduates will grow to become well-rounded citizens with an excellent education and a caring heart â€“ not just for their fellow man, but for the environment and earth as well.

job responsibilities :we are seeking a results-oriented database engineer intern to help optimize the performance of our organization's databases.Â to ensure success as a database engineer intern, you should exhibit knowledge of best practices in database management.

maintaining and enhancing the performance of existing database programs.
assisting database development teams in designing new database programs that meet the organization's data storage needs.
monitoring databases and related systems to ensure optimized performance.
reviewing database scripts, database design and audit log reports, as well as system information.
performing debugging procedures on database scripts; as well as resolving conflicts.
mentoring database administrators and providing them with technical support.
adhering to best practices in securely storing, backing up, and archiving data.
documenting processes related to database design, configuration, and performance.
keeping abreast of developments and best practices in database engineering.

pre-requisites :
bachelor's degree/deploma in information systems, information technology, computer science, or similar.
applicable licensing, certification, and registration.
in-depth knowledge of structured query language (sql).
extensive experience with database technologies and architecture.
sound knowledge of best practices in database management and data security.
strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
exceptional problem-solving and critical thinking skills.
excellent collaboration and communication skills.

are you game?

job summary:
we are seeking a highly motivated and dedicated chemistry internship student to join our chemistry industry team in bandar enstek. as an intern, you will have the opportunity to gain hands-on experience in various laboratory techniques. you will work closely with our experienced chemists and lab technician and contribute to ongoing projects.
skills:
- strong understanding of basic chemistry principles
- familiarity with laboratory equipment and techniques
- good analytical skills 
- proficiency in microsoft office applications
- good communication skills 
responsibilities:
- conduct laboratory experiments under the supervision of experienced chemists and lab technician
- prepare samples for analysis using various techniques 
- perform data analysis using appropriate software tools 
- document experimental results accurately 
- participate in team meetings and discussions on ongoing projects 
qualifications:
- currently enrolled in a bachelor's or master's degree program in chemistry or related field
 - strong academic record with a gpa of 3.0 or higher 
 - previous laboratory experience is preferred but not required

asian secrets sdn bhd is a multifaceted lifestyle concept store based in malaysia, dedicated to showcasing the rich tapestry of asian culture and traditions. founded on the philosophy of preserving heritage while embracing modern living, we bring back centuries' old artistic interior deco items and herbal remedies; a diverse assortment of eco-friendly products along with rare and precious fine food & beverages and indulgences.since our inception in 2005, asian secrets has been the beacon of authenticity and quality, serving as the proud umbrella brand for four distinguished entities: fine batik, where craftsmanship meets elegance; ecowarna, where sustainability meets style; rahsia herbal, where nature's bounty meets wellness; and exotica, where luxury meets indulgenceÂ requirements for information technology position at asian secrets:Â educational background: currently pursuing a degree in computer science, information technology, software engineering, business information system, or an equivalent field.key skills: proficiency in visual basic or php is required.additional skills: familiarity with the windows application development life cycle is advantageous.knowledge: familiarity with crystal report, sql server, and cosec will be considered an added advantage.technical proficiency: knowledge of hardware troubleshooting, web design, jquery, php, or the codeigniter framework is also an added advantage.job description for information technologyÂ user support: provide support to both internal and external users, ensuring smooth and efficient it operations.troubleshooting: debug and troubleshoot system issues, resolving them promptly to minimize disruptions.application development: engage in the windows application development life cycle using technologies like visual basic, crystal report, sql server, and php.business intelligence: contribute to business intelligence (bi) projects aimed at data-driven decision-making.infrastructure maintenance: implement and maintain software and hardware infrastructure to ensure optimal it functionality.e-commerce implementation: play a key role in implementing e-commerce capabilities for our retail business, driving online revenue.information management: effectively manage and organize information resources.information delivery: provide relevant information to end users, ensuring it is readily accessible and valuable.benefitsintern allowance: you'll receive an internship allowance ranging from rm500 to 1000performance-based monthly bonus: there's an opportunity to earn a monthly allowance of up to rm500 based on your performance.convenient location: our office is conveniently located just 2-3 minutes walking distance from lrt kerinchi.hands-on learning: we're dedicated to helping you hone your skills by providing numerous hands-on experiences through active participation in our business processes and improvement initiatives.career advancement: upon successful completion of your internship, we offer full-time employment with a clear career plan to guide your professional development.management trainee program: exceptional performers may have the opportunity to join our fast-track management trainee program, designed to groom you for a managerial role within just 3 years.comfortable workspace: our cozy pantry is equipped with tables, chairs, a refrigerator, and a microwave to ensure you have a pleasant place to relax and recharge.additional benefitsallowance providedtraining providedovertime payperformance bonus5 working dayssummary of role JobTitle: MoHE ï¿½ Intel MDC Elite Internship
summary:
job details:job description:Â step into the future with intel's elite internship program in collaboration with the ministry of higher education malaysia. be part of change, innovation, and the extraordinary.
this provides the successful candidate with

specialized synopsys training with viva (5 weeks)
in-depth intel training on pre & post silicon
hands-on experience with cutting-edge technologies
collaboration with intel's global teams

qualifications:open to year 3 students with bachelor or master degree in electrical engineering, electronic engineering, electrical and electronic engineering, microelectronic engineering, mechatronic engineering, computer engineering or computer science.
additional qualifications include

knowledge of computer system architecture
understanding of a subsystem hwsw stack including the silicon all onboard hw components and connectors external or plugin adapters and devices drivers and applications
experience with c and/or c programming
highly motivated curious and a team player with keen interest in finding and resolving silicon failures

job type:student / internshift:shift 1 (malaysia)primary location:Â malaysia, kulimadditional locations:business group:in the design engineering group (deg), we take pride in developing the best-in-class socs, cores, and ips that power intelâ€™s products. from development, to integration, validation, and manufacturing readiness, our mission is to deliver leadership products through the pursuit of mooreâ€™s law and groundbreaking innovations.Â  deg is intelâ€™s engineering group, supplying silicon to business units as well as other engineering teams.Â  as a critical provider of all intel products, deg leadership has a responsibility to ensure the delivery of these products in a cost efficient and effective manner.posting statement:all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, religious creed, sex, national origin, ancestry, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, military and veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, gender, gender expression, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by local law, regulation, or ordinance.position of trustn/awork model for this rolethis role will be eligible for our hybrid work model which allows employees to split their time between working on-site at their assigned intel site and off-site. in certain circumstances the work model may change to accommodate business needs.

a snapshot of your day
as an intern part of the soc, you will be handed tasks from the soc team who will be mentoring and teaching you on the ot environment cyber security industry. you will also be shadowing the team on their daily tasks and will be exposed to the daily activities of a soc.
how youâ€™ll make an impact
â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  you would be assisting in the day to day activities in a soc environment. (monitoring and triaging)
â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  you will be trained in the operational technology (ot) landscape.
â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  you will be able to learn how to use different sets of technologies and tools. (siem, scanners, and firewalls)
â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  upskilling your people skills.
what you bring
â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  bachelor degree in cybersecurity/ information technology
â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  willingness to learn
â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  determination and energy
â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  ability to work within a team
â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  willingness to travel, office located in cyberjaya
about the team
the team is a group of individuals that are cyber security specialists that are upskilling themselves with the ot( operational technology) whilst providing cyber security services to our customers. we service the asian and middle east regions providing a huge exposure to practices around the globe.
who is siemens energy?
at siemens energy, we are more than just an energy technology company. we meet the growing energy demand across 90+ countries while ensuring our climate is protected. with more than 92,000 dedicated employees, we not only generate electricity for over 16% of the global community, but weâ€™re also using our technology to help protect people and the environment.
our global team is committed to making sustainable, reliable, and affordable energy a reality by pushing the boundaries of what is possible. we uphold a 150-year legacy of innovation that encourages our search for people who will support our focus on decarbonization, new technologies, and energy transformation.
division messaging
our gas services division offers low-emission power generation through service and decarbonization. zero or low emission power generation and all gas turbines under one roof, steam turbines and generators. decarbonization opportunities through service offerings, modernization, and digitalization of the fleet.
check out this video to learn more about our gas service business https://www.siemens-energy.com/global/en/offerings/power-generation.html
our commitment to diversity
lucky for us, we are not all the same. through diversity we generate power. we run on inclusion and our combined creative energy is fueled by over 130 nationalities. siemens energy celebrates character â€“ no matter what ethnic background, gender, age, religion, identity, or disability. we energize society, all of society, and we do not discriminate based on our differences.Â 
check out this video to learn more about siemens energy: https://bit.ly/3hd9pvk

jr52421 intern - finance
project title:
assess and design capital purchase order (po) change for prepayments
description:
capital purchase orders (zcap & ystd capital assigned pos) are not designed with prepayments in mind which can lead to accounting fallouts and business process issues. assess accounting pain points from prepayment of capital po and design changes from a cross functional basis.
scope:

engage with different teams to assess pain points across the finance and accounting organization
assess feasibility for customizing sap to meet micronâ€™s requirements
perform uat and change management communications as well as monitor for appropriateness during hypercare

supporting team:

accounts payable bpo team
procurement team
it team

deliverables:
capital pos are able to appropriately capture advance/deposit accounting entries and reflect them in real time in the po module
stretch goal:
value added bi and reporting for business process monitoring for procurement/finance teams

company description


at western digital, our vision is to power global innovation and push the boundaries of technology to make what you thought was once impossible, possible.
at our core, western digital is a company of problem solvers. people achieve extraordinary things given the right technology. for decades, weâ€™ve been doing just that. our technology helped people put a man on the moon.
we are a key partner to some of the largest and highest growth organizations in the world. from energizing the most competitive gaming platforms, to enabling systems to make cities safer and cars smarter and more connected, to powering the data centers behind many of the worldâ€™s biggest companies and public cloud, western digital is fueling a brighter, smarter future.
binge-watch any shows, use social media or shop online lately? youâ€™ll find western digital supporting the storage infrastructure behind many of these platforms. and, that flash memory card that captures and preserves your most precious moments? thatâ€™s us, too.
we offer an expansive portfolio of technologies, storage devices and platforms for business and consumers alike. our data-centric solutions are comprised of the western digitalÂ®, g-technologyâ„¢, sandiskÂ® and wdÂ® brands.
todayâ€™s exceptional challenges require your unique skills. itâ€™s you & western digital. together, weâ€™re the next big thing in data.

what's the role?
join us as an intern in our it team and you will work on exciting projects ranging from it operations or it infrastructure. as a member of our international and multidisciplinary team, you will gain experience in global it project and solution management, improve your practical expertise, and solve real-life challenges in an international enterprise.
who is hilti?
hilti is where innovation is improving productivity, safety and sustainability in the global construction industry, and beyond. where strong customer relationships are creating solutions that build a better future. where there is pride and a sense of belonging across our 120 locations, carrying right into our lives and homes. where people are exploring possibilities, leveraging their potential, owning their personal development and growing lasting careers. 
global it within hilti is a truly global team with main hubs in buchs (switzerland), kuala lumpur (malaysia) and plano/tulsa (usa). all locations have highly competent teams who work very closely together. hilti`s global it team is known for their focus on sustainable value creation by translating latest it innovations into value creating solutions & services.
what does the role involve?
you will identify and analyze business requirements for creative and innovative it solutions based on customer needs and strategic requirements. you are responsible to perform the administration and operations of sap systems, the associated components, 3rd party tools such as automic as well as other systems such as salesforce.com. 
this role involves leading incident de-escalation via a war room approach, for hiltiâ€™s whole global it community. you are required to initiate, facilitate, and drive war rooms for critical incidents until resolution through collaboration with multiple teams â€“ internal, external and/or business partners. you also ensure all stakeholders are well informed throughout the process.

 we have an excellent mix of people, which we believe makes for a more vibrant, more innovative and more productive team.
 
what do we offer?
show us what youâ€™re made of and weâ€™ll offer you opportunities to move around the business â€“ to work abroad, experience different job functions and tackle different markets. itâ€™s a great way to find the right match for your ambitions and achieve the exciting career youâ€™re after.  we have a very thorough people review process, unlike any we know of in any other business. we can pair talent with opportunities - developing our people in their current roles or challenging them to work in new ways or in new places. itâ€™s how we find the right fit, further our teams personally and professionally, get the best value for each employee and increase the job satisfaction. additionally, we offer you a wide range of benefits.
what you need is:
 you are currently enrolled in bachelor's / master's, or studies in computer science / information technology / engineering (computer/telecommunication) /Â science & technology or related fields   your strategic approach and good problem-solving skills are paired with proactiveness and a hands-on mentality   you have strong communication skills and interpersonal skills and you are fluent in written and spoken english   you are eager to learn and challenge yourself 
why should you apply?
become a valuable member of our highly professional and international team of it experts and meet the challenges of a global multinational company using latest technologies. you will have the freedom to act in the responsible area with career prospects in a dynamic environment, excellent opportunities to develop yourself to higher levels and wider range of knowledge. our team in kuala lumpur is a fully recognized and respected competence center that is covering all relevant areas of it. 80% of the top positions are filled internally. we have a clearly defined career development track for every individual employee and an excellent team which are duly rewarded by performance.
click through the 'apply now' button where you will be asked to upload your cv and answer a couple of short questionsâ€“the whole process should take around 90 seconds. if we like what we see, you'll be invited to a telephone interview.  if we don't have a suitable role for you at the moment, we will keep you in our talent pool for the future so your recruitment process might take a bit longer but we'll be sure to stay in touch. 
#joinhiltiasiaitservices  looking forward to hearing from you!

company: Jacobs Engineering Group Malaysia Sdn Bhd
summary:

company: Operion Ecommerce and Software Sdn Bhd
summary:
descriptionresponsibilities: collaborate on project requirements and objectives. design and implement software solutions. write clean, efficient code and conduct testing. assist with debugging and troubleshooting. document technical specifications and processes. stay updated on industry trends and technologies. 
requirements: diploma / bachelor's degree in computer science or related field. strong understanding of software development fundamentals. proficiency in one or more programming languages. familiarity with development tools and technologies. excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. strong communication and teamwork abilities. enthusiastic about learning and personal development.
companyoperion ecommerce & software sdn bhd located at butterworth, penang with providing the service related to information technology such as web design, app development, software customisation and others marketing services. 
for the last 15 years, we have perfected our approach to web design, e-commerce, software development, software customisation, and mobile app development for more than 50 different business sectors with the help of 12 creative team members from around the world.
our team of experts in web development, software architecture design, database design, and research & development work closely with our customers to meet their specific demands and needs, always providing the best possible solutions.
we produce high quality software in three perspective: 1. scalable in any situation and integrates easily with any platform.2. able to handle various user requirements and environment changes.3. the framework is easy to maintain by any level of programmer.

descriptionjob responsibilities:â€¢ to be responsible for the effective planning, delivery of various computer subjects and academic development of the students as well as to provide pastoral care to students. â€¢ to develop and manage learning modules and to ensure that academic programmes are delivered in accordance with the prescribed quality standards.â€¢ to assess and evaluate studentsâ€™ performance to ensure that learning objectives have been achieved through summative and formative assessment.â€¢ to participate in extra curricular activities or other functions as and when required. 
job requirements:â€¢ minimum of an undergraduate degree in information technology, computer science, software engineering, or a related field with at least a minimum of 5 years of strong industry experience in software development, system design, or related roles is highly desirable.â€¢ preferably with a masterâ€™s degree or ph.in it/ computer science or equivalent.â€¢ experience in teaching computer science or software engineering courses at the undergraduate or postgraduate level is an added advantageâ€¢ have a strong understanding of data structures, data modelling and software architecture.â€¢ candidates must be able to teach technical modules with proficiency in relational database structures, research methods, machine learning, cloud based technologies, iot, scripting languages (i.e. python, perl), programing languages (i.e. java, c/c++, php, .net, sql). â€¢ have experience in big data technologies (i.e. hadoop, hbase, lucene/solr), analytics packages (i.e. r, mahout, matlab, octave, weka) is an added advantage.â€¢ possess good communication, interpersonal and presentation skills in both english & bahasa malaysia.
we thank applicants for their interest, but only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
companysentral college penang is a private college situated in george town, penang. the campus is located at lebuh penang, and it is the tallest building in the core zone of unesco world heritage site.
the team at sentral college penang upholds its founding goal to develop students into wholesome capable individuals who will support their family, serve the community and strive for the country.
our vision is to be an impactful and significant institution, fostering programme relevance, creative thinking and institutional excellence.
we provide conducive work environment for our employees who are the vital key success to our institution of higher learning. we are committed in providing an amiable, intellectually challenging and rewarding workplace.

what's the role?
join us as an intern in our it team and you will work on exciting projects as a devops engineer. as a member of our international and multidisciplinary team, you will gain experience in global it project and solution management, improve your practical expertise, and solve real-life challenges in an international enterprise. 
the start date for the internship is flexible to the student's availability with a duration of at least 4-6 months.
who is hilti?
hilti is where innovation is improving productivity, safety and sustainability in the global construction industry, and beyond. where strong customer relationships are creating solutions that build a better future. where there is pride and a sense of belonging across our 120 locations, carrying right into our lives and homes. where people are exploring possibilities, leveraging their potential, owning their personal development and growing lasting careers. 
global it within hilti is a truly global team with main hubs in buchs (switzerland), kuala lumpur (malaysia) and plano/tulsa (usa). all locations have highly competent teams who work very closely together. hilti`s global it team is known for their focus on sustainable value creation by translating latest it innovations into value creating solutions & services.
what does the role involve?
as a  devops engineer  , you will be the go-to technical expert who have wide range of understanding on both development and operation aspect of hilti cloud products and systems. you will assume the responsibilities below:  
  partner with business & it stakeholders to understand requirements, and translate them into technical design together with solution architects.   work closely with product development team and cloud platform engineering team to continuously improve the overall ci/cd toolchain.   drive technical lifecycle activities with product development team to ensure evergreen of our it systems.   continuously explore and improve existing solutions based on proven and future-ready technologies.   provide 2nd / 3rd level support to business and it stakeholders.  

 we have an excellent mix of people, which we believe makes for a more vibrant, more innovative and more productive team.
 
what do we offer?
show us what youâ€™re made of and weâ€™ll offer you opportunities to move around the business â€“ to work abroad, experience different job functions and tackle different markets. itâ€™s a great way to find the right match for your ambitions and achieve the exciting career youâ€™re after.  we have a very thorough people review process, unlike any we know of in any other business. we can pair talent with opportunities - developing our people in their current roles or challenging them to work in new ways or in new places. itâ€™s how we find the right fit, further our teams personally and professionally, get the best value for each employee and increase the job satisfaction. additionally, we offer you a wide range of benefits.
what you need is:
  you are currently enrolled in bachelor's /Â master's, or studies in information technology / software engineering /Â data science /Â computer engineering or related fields.   your strategic approach and good problem-solving skills are paired with proactiveness and a hands-on mentality.   you have strong communication skills and interpersonal skills and you are fluent in written and spoken english.   you are eager to learn and challenge yourself.  
why should you apply?
become a valuable member of our highly professional and international team of it experts and meet the challenges of a global multinational company using latest technologies. you will have the freedom to act in the responsible area with career prospects in a dynamic environment, excellent opportunities to develop yourself to higher levels and wider range of knowledge. our team in kuala lumpur is a fully recognized and respected competence center that is covering all relevant areas of it. 80% of the top positions are filled internally. we have a clearly defined career development track for every individual employee and an excellent team which are duly rewarded by performance.
click through the 'apply now' button where you will be asked to upload your cv and answer a couple of short questionsâ€“the whole process should take around 90 seconds. if we like what we see, you'll be invited to a telephone interview.  if we don't have a suitable role for you at the moment, we will keep you in our talent pool for the future so your recruitment process might take a bit longer but we'll be sure to stay in touch. 
#joinhiltiasiaitservices  looking forward to hearing from you!

what's the role?
join us as an intern in our it team and you will work on exciting projects ranging as an it quality assurance analyst. as a member of our international and multidisciplinary team, you will gain experience in global it project and solution management, improve your practical expertise, and solve real-life challenges in an international enterprise. 
the start date for the internship is flexible to the student's availability with a duration of at least 4-6 months.
who is hilti?
hilti is where innovation is improving productivity, safety and sustainability in the global construction industry, and beyond. where strong customer relationships are creating solutions that build a better future. where there is pride and a sense of belonging across our 120 locations, carrying right into our lives and homes. where people are exploring possibilities, leveraging their potential, owning their personal development and growing lasting careers. 
global it within hilti is a truly global team with main hubs in buchs (switzerland), kuala lumpur (malaysia) and plano/tulsa (usa). all locations have highly competent teams who work very closely together. hilti`s global it team is known for their focus on sustainable value creation by translating latest it innovations into value creating solutions & services.
what does the role involve?
 quality assurance (qa)  is a key disciple in it product and solution creation. be part of the journey, to refine our qa processes in terms of way of working and testing approach within the software development lifecycle (sdlc) of global it. 
in order to ensure both new and existing features on our it platform are up and running, you will define, design and review test cases to be executed. together with a team of qas, we look to ensuring quality in terms of functionality, performance, security and user experience (ux). 
last but not least, you will monitor all stages of software development and configuration to identify and manage malfunctions; bring transparency on quality status and look into continuous improvement in way of working, to meet our quality standards.

 we have an excellent mix of people, which we believe makes for a more vibrant, more innovative and more productive team.
 
what do we offer?
show us what youâ€™re made of and weâ€™ll offer you opportunities to move around the business â€“ to work abroad, experience different job functions and tackle different markets. itâ€™s a great way to find the right match for your ambitions and achieve the exciting career youâ€™re after.  we have a very thorough people review process, unlike any we know of in any other business. we can pair talent with opportunities - developing our people in their current roles or challenging them to work in new ways or in new places. itâ€™s how we find the right fit, further our teams personally and professionally, get the best value for each employee and increase the job satisfaction. additionally, we offer you a wide range of benefits.
what you need is:
  you are currently enrolled in bachelor's / master's, or studies in information technology/ software engineering / data science /Â computer engineering, or related fields.   your strategic approach and good problem-solving skills are paired with proactiveness and a hands-on mentality.   you have strong communication skills and interpersonal skills and you are fluent in written and spoken english.   you are eager to learn and challenge yourself.  
why should you apply?
become a valuable member of our highly professional and international team of it experts and meet the challenges of a global multinational company using latest technologies. you will have the freedom to act in the responsible area with career prospects in a dynamic environment, excellent opportunities to develop yourself to higher levels and wider range of knowledge. our team in kuala lumpur is a fully recognized and respected competence center that is covering all relevant areas of it. 80% of the top positions are filled internally. we have a clearly defined career development track for every individual employee and an excellent team which are duly rewarded by performance.
click through the 'apply now' button where you will be asked to upload your cv and answer a couple of short questionsâ€“the whole process should take around 90 seconds. if we like what we see, you'll be invited to a telephone interview.  if we don't have a suitable role for you at the moment, we will keep you in our talent pool for the future so your recruitment process might take a bit longer but we'll be sure to stay in touch. 
#joinhiltiasiaitservices  looking forward to hearing from you!

we are looking for interns to join our it managed services team in cyberjaya to help deliver top-notch support to our customers. in this role, you'll gain real life and hands-on work experience in networking & security, server, systems, virtualization, cloud, and desktop computing.
you will embark on an exciting career in it managed services by joining our 6-month internship program. we are looking for individuals with excellent personalities, self-initiative, and a keen interest in various technologies such as routing & switching, desktop computing, virtualization, server, or azure cloud.
this internship offers you the chance to be absorbed into the company upon the completion of your internship program, with exposure to three tracks - network & security support, digital workplace/systems support or general it technical support.
responsibilities: troubleshooting and resolving technical issues for customers diagnosing and providing technical supports to our customers resolving technical issues, and maintaining customer's satisfaction 
requirements
 must be able to commit to a 6 months internship program must be willing to work on 12 hours shifts, including weekends and nights. must be fluent in english must be in final semester before graduating

job description:
dxc technology is a fortune 500 global it services leader. our more than 130,000 people in 70- plus countries are entrusted by our customers to deliver what matters most. we use the power of technology to deliver mission-critical it services across the enterprise technology stack to drive business impact. dxc is an employer of choice with strong values, and fosters a culture of inclusion, belonging and corporate citizenship.
start your career with a company that is passionate about developing and nurturing talent in a high-performance culture. 
under the dxc's internship program, you will be equipped with the necessary skillset and knowledge to better prepare you in securing your ideal job, especially in the digital space. 
security â€“ knowledge of client-server applications, multi-tier web applications, relational databases, firewalls, vpns, and enterprise anti-virus products. strong understanding of security incident management, malware management and vulnerability management processes. 
modern workplace â€“ knowledge in software and hardware troubleshooting. respond to service, product, technical, and customer- relations questions. 
itoâ€“ knowledge of the following technologies such as wintel, unix, virtualization, cloud. 
requirement:

proficient in microsoft office.
knowledge in desktop operating systems, various software applications and basic hardware for the pc; principles and theories of network systems and internet technology.
good oral and written communication skills and ability to establish and maintain effective working relationship.
ability to coordinate several diverse job requirements and projects.
ability to identify, research problems and resolve user issues.

must be currently enrolled in a degree or diploma program (any computer related program) at college or university intake: april 2024 /july 2024/ oct 2024/ jan 2025Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â duration: 6 monthseligibility: malaysian citizenÂ  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â work arrangement: hybrid 

our culture and benefits: dxc is committed to building better futures for our customers, colleagues, environment, and communities. we take care of each other and foster a culture of inclusion, belonging and corporate citizenship. we put this to action developing and implementing societal initiatives within our social impact practice.
#wearedxc as an employer of choice, our â€œpeople firstâ€ philosophy means we offer competitive remuneration, benefits, training and career opportunities that reflect our commitment to improving the lives of our employees, and the communities in which we live and work. some of these include;


extensive resources to support your onboarding and continual development including dxc university
dxc recognition, our global virtual platform that fosters a culture of appreciation and celebration with real-time reward and recognition
we know that great people refer great people. we will reward you when you bring your friends and family to work at dxc
more time to do the things you love with flexible leave options, including purchased leave
take time to give back with charitable and emergency services volunteer days
well-being matters to us and our employee assistance program is there to support you and your family


how to apply & our commitment to you in return: if you would like to be part of a culture that drives innovation, delivers results, rewards performance and encourages ideas, then please press the "apply now" button to submit your resume. in return, we agree to ensure a hiring process that is enjoyable, thorough, and fair.
we strive to provide an environment that lets you thrive and show off the very best version of yourself, while learning about us at the same time. interviews and onboarding are conducted online, as part of us being a virtual-first company.


we are an equal opportunity employer: dxc is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and we welcome submissions from people from all walks of life. we celebrate our diversity and recognise it is the unique contributions of our people that give us our edge. we stand by the â€˜bring your whole-self to workâ€™ philosophy.
it is our inclusive culture that powers our results, and our company grows only if our people grow. accommodation of special needs for qualified candidates may be considered within the framework of the dxc accommodation policy. in addition, dxc technology is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to support qualified individuals with physical and mental disabilities


recruitment fraud is a scheme in which fictitious job opportunities are offered to job seekers typically through online services, such as false websites, or through unsolicited emails claiming to be from the company. these emails may request recipients to provide personal information or to make payments as part of their illegitimate recruiting process. dxc does not make offers of employment via social media networks and dxc never asks for any money or payments from applicants at any point in the recruitment process, nor ask a job seeker to purchase it or other equipment on our behalf.
Â more information on employment scams is availableÂ here
.

company: Continental Automotive Components Malaysia Sdn. Bhd
summary:
we are offering salesforce internship program.Â main tasks is to assist with implementation, customization and maintenance of salesforce solutions, supporting users, conducting data analysis, and participating in project meetings. other responsibilities may include creating reports and dashboards, troubleshooting issues and learning about various aspects of salesforce administration and development. the internship program is based in petaling jaya, malaysia and working together as part of the global competence center of ecommerce, fleet solutions & data science.

assisting with salesforce configuration - this includes setting up new fields, workflows, validation rules and other configuration tasks within the salesforce platform
supporting users - responsible for providing support to end-users, answering questions and troubleshooting issues related to salesforce platform
data management - work on data cleansing, data migration, and data quality initiatives within salesforce. this includes using tools like data loader, excel, etc
documentation and training - tasked with documenting processes, creating user guides, or even conducting training sessions for new salesforce users
working closely with other team members, such as salesforce administrators, developers, business analyst and stakeholders to support ongoing project and initiatives
problem solving - expected to analyze issues, propose solutions and implement fixes within the salesforce environment

JobTitle: Internship â€“ ID Management / End User Services (IT)
summary:
description


as an intern, your primary role will be to support various teams and departments within the organization. you will be joining our dynamic and fast-paced workplace, where you will have the opportunity to gain practical experience and develop your skills. below are some of the general responsibilities and may vary depending on the department you are attached to:
1. assist with research tasks: you will be responsible for conducting research related to various projects. this may include market research, competitor analysis, and gathering data to support decision-making.
Â 2. administrative support: as an intern, you will be assisting with general administrative tasks such as data entry, filing, answering phone calls, and scheduling appointments. you may also assist with organizing meetings and preparing meeting materials.
Â 3. documentation and reporting: you will be responsible for maintaining accurate records and documentation. this may include filing reports, updating spreadsheets, and creating presentations.
Â 4. project support: you will provide support to ongoing projects by assisting team members with tasks and ensuring project deliverables are met. this may involve coordinating with different departments, assisting with project planning, and helping to meet project deadlines.
Â 5. learn from professionals: as an intern, you will have the opportunity to learn from experienced professionals in various fields. you will be encouraged to ask questions and actively participate in team meetings and discussions.
Â 6. professional development: we value your growth and development. throughout your internship, you will have access to training resources and mentorship opportunities to enhance your skills and knowledge in your desired field.


qualifications



currently enrolled in a relevant degree program or recently graduated
able to work for a min of 8 weeks. please indicate your internship period in your resume.
excellent organizational and time management skills
strong attention to detail
effective communication skills, both written and verbal
proficient in using microsoft office suite (word, excel, powerpoint)
ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team environment
eagerness to learn and contribute to the organization

we offer a supportive and inclusive workplace environment, where you will have the opportunity to gain valuable industry experience. this internship will provide you with the skills and knowledge needed to excel in your career.
if you are looking for an exciting opportunity to kickstart your professional journey, we encourage you to apply for this internship position.

JobTitle: Sarawak Energy Internship Programme 2024 (Intake July to September 2024)
summary:
external open resourcing
location:Â Â malaysia (my), all operating units within sarawak
company:Â sarawak energy berhad
number of openings:Â 200Â 
closing date: 1 july 2024
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
we invite all eligible and qualified students in their final year of diploma or first degree at universities, colleges, or polytechnics to apply for sarawak energy internship programme to gain valuable on-the-job experience opportunity.
our objectives:Â 

provide students with opportunities to gain work experience and apply specific technical skills and knowledge learnt in universities to meet their curricular requirements
help students to be employment-ready by creating linkages between education, training and work through capability building
identify talents for recruitment into sarawak energyâ€™s competitive graduate talent pool
part of sarawak energyâ€™s integrated workforce planning (iwp) resourcing strategy to assist in the delivery of business priorities

focused disciplines:

engineering (electrical/mechanical/civil)
occupational health & safety
finance/accounting
law
information technology
human resources management
business administration
communication/multimedia
social science/sustainability

requirement:

full-time student
possess at least a cumulative grade point average (cgpa) of 3.30 or equivalent
minimum 10 weeks of internship duration
eligible applicants must be enrolled in a graduate programme (diploma, bachelor's degree, master's degree or equivalent) at the time of application

required documents:Â 
all applicants must include the following documents in their application:

internship letter from university/college/polytechnic
updated resume
latest cgpa results
one photocopy of mykad

terms and conditions:

sarawak energy does not provide accommodation. all expenses will be borne by the respective students. however, you will be entitled to receive monthly allowance during the duration of your internship.
application must be submitted two (2) months prior to the commencement of internship period.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
our internship programme is open to all malaysians, however, preference will be given to sarawakians.

job description:about abbott
abbott is a global healthcare leader that helps people live more fully at all stages of life. our portfolio of life-changing technologies spans the spectrum of healthcare, with leading businesses and products in diagnostics, medical devices, nutritional and branded generic medicines. our 115,000 colleagues serve people in more than 160 countries.
about the internship program
the information technology (it) intern program is a minimum of 12-week program that aligns with the academic calendar and the needs of the individual business. the it intern program provides current college students with meaningful, challenging projects with contributing deliverables that impact our business.Â  it interns have opportunity to engage, network, explore and immerse themselves in abbott through formal business presentations, mentorships, and social gatherings.
we are honored to be ranked as the top internship program globally by choosemycompany's happyindexÂ® trainees survey and vault's 2023 internship rankings have recognized our program as the leading internship program in health sciences and finance in the united states.
through this program, qualifying interns are well positioned to compete for it professional development program (itpdp) opportunities upon completion of their studies in the future.
basic qualifications
candidates must be interested in pursuing a career in the it field. individuals interested in the it intern program must currently be pursuing bachelorâ€™s or masterâ€™s degree in an it related discipline or formal focus area. the candidate must have an excellent academic record with a minimum 3.0/4.0 gpa or equivalent. candidates must also have permanent unrestricted authorization to work in malaysia.
preferred qualifications
the ideal candidate's coursework should include a variety of it-related classes.Â  this includes coursework in one or more of the following:

data analytics and visualization tools
programming, software development
robotic process automation (rpa)
system, network administration
cloud development
math, statistics
cybersecurity, security
user interface (ui), user experience (ux), customer experience (cx)
project management

ideal candidates will have

analytical, creative problem-solving, decision-making, and strategic thinking abilities
good written and oral communication skills
solid planning and organizational skills
extracurricular activities that demonstrate it related and/or leadership capabilities (in or outside of school)

what you will do
it interns will be aligned to assignments that are in key areas of it.Â  assignment matching takes the it internâ€™s interests, talents and development needs into consideration to support the best fit â€“ based on project timing and availability.
our internship program offers:


meaningful work - from the beginning, our interns work on meaningful, challenging projects with direct impact on our business.

access to senior leadership - you will have regular access to senior leadership and the opportunity to grow and learn from the best each day.

career development - you will receive ongoing training, join a global community of interns, and can create your own network that can support you throughout the years. all this can boost your career â€¦ even to the point of becoming one of our leaders in the future.

benefits - you can use the benefits and programs we offer to help you live a full life, both in and out of the office.

focus areas for information technology interns could include business systems analysis, project management, application development, data analysis and network infrastructure.
application process
please note, you are submitting for general consideration only. your qualifications will be reviewed and if you fit the current need, you will be contacted by a talent acquisition professional. we are looking for interns to join us from june 2024, a minimum of 12-weeks.
the base pay for this position is n/ain specific locations, the pay range may vary from the range posted.
job family:administrative supportdivision:gis global information serviceslocation:malaysia > selangor : imazium, no. 8, jalan ss 21/37additional locations:work shift:standardtravel:nomedical surveillance:not applicablesignificant work activities:continuous sitting for prolonged periods (more than 2 consecutive hours in an 8 hour day)

JobTitle: Internship For Manufacturing Technical Planning Software development
summary:
company description


bosch has been present in malaysia since 1923, represented by robert bosch sdn bhd. in malaysia, bosch is active in four business sectors: mobility solutions, industrial technology, consumer goods, and energy and building technology. the company has three manufacturing sites and research and development offices in penang, producing automotive electronics, power tools and steering systems, and soon a fourth plant with a final testing centre for sensors and semiconductors. in 2020, bosch malaysia generated consolidated sales of rm 518.4 million (108.1 million euros), and currently employs more than 4,000 associates.
pgp5 plant is bosch groupâ€™s newest expansion in malaysia a semiconductor test site in batu kawan penang. the construction has begun in may 2021 and first series of production to commence in 2023. with the long-term forecasts for growth of semiconductor component quantities, coupled with the front-end production in boschâ€™s dresden facility in germany, capacity expansion is required for the back-end production, which is the final testing phase of semiconductors and sensors. pgp5 will primarily focus on the final testing of components manufactured at bosch automotive electronicsâ€™ fab in dresden, germany. the plant will also house r&d and training facilities.
bosch in malaysia is a part of the bosch group, a leading global supplier of technology and services. the bosch groupâ€™s strategic objective is to deliver innovations for a connected life. bosch improves quality of life worldwide with products and services that are innovative and spark enthusiasm. in short, bosch creates technology that is â€œinvented for lifeâ€.


job description


to learn and understand the planning element and statistical requirement.
start with basic gui development.
create pc software with .exe extension
support on daily general manufacturing


qualifications

computer science / it students

additional information


leave entitlement e.g: annual leave, medical leave and etc
company insurances and etc

 constantly monitor and ensure service compliance  undertake quality assurance and field biologist inspections for rentokil reporting services and termite management programs or other high value services sold by the branch  responsible for timely and proper completion of the customers and administrative reports involved in training preparation for pest control division

currently pursuing tertiary education/final semester (bachelor degree in biological science or equivalent, preferably major in entomology or vector control)
possess valid d licence & owns a car

rewards and benefits
 monthly allowance opportunity to be absorbed as permanent employee (based on your work performance)
